channel.title: Day 1 to night 1 lag
channel.description: probably about 10 different instances now of Day 1 never turning into night 1 and my game is "not responding" and if I try to reconnect I'm just sitting at the loading screen until I close the game again. Really hoping when that happens, it's happening to everybody in those games. So people aren't getting reported. :(

item.title: Day 1 to night 1 lag
item.dc:creator: CN73DRUMMER
item.description:
Somebody in game told me opening logbook during D1 causes it.

Read full topic
